channel.title: Centos on Jacobc' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Centos on Jacobc' Blog

item.title: CentOS7 glibc 2.17 升级到 2.29
item.description: 原因： 遇到以下问题 ❯ node node: /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by node) node: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.25' not found (required by node) node: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.28' not found (required by node) node: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.9' not found (required by node) node: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found (required by node) node: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by node) 需要升级 glibc

item.title: Centos 安装 oh-my-zsh
item.description: 查看、安装 zsh 查看是否安装了 zsh # 方法一： chsh -l # 方法二： cat /etc/shells # 可能结果： /bin/sh /bin/bash /sbin/nologin /usr/bin/sh /usr/bin/bash /usr/sbin/nologin /bin/zsh # 如果有 /bin/zsh 代表已经安装，反之则没有 安装 zsh yum install -y zsh 切换 shell 为 zsh

item.title: Centos7 安装 Docker
item.description: 一条命令安装 官方脚本： curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | bash -s docker --mirror Aliyun 国内 daocloud 安装命令： curl -sSL https://get.daocloud.io/docker | sh 手动安装指定版本 卸载旧版本 sudo yum remove docker \ docker-client \ docker-client-latest \ docker-common \ docker-latest \ docker-latest-logrotate \ docker-logrotate \ docker-engine \ container-selinux \ docker-selinux 安装
